mapper.select: select * from faq_board ORDER BY bno DESC
select * from member where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into faq_board (bno, title, content, username, regdate) VALUES (#bno, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update faq_board username = #{username}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE bno = #{bno}
